Uses of Class
org.training.foodorderapplication.dto.Response

Packages that use Response
Package
Description
org.training.foodorderapplication.controller
This package contains controller classes for the Food Order Application.
org.training.foodorderapplication.service
This package contains the service interfaces for the Food Order Application.
org.training.foodorderapplication.service.implementation
This package contains the implementation classes for the service interfaces in the Food Order Application.

  • Uses of Response in org.training.foodorderapplication.controller

    Methods in org.training.foodorderapplication.controller that return types with arguments of type Response
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response>
    MenuController.addFoodItems(@Valid FoodItemDto itemDto, String token)
    This method handles the HTTP POST request to add a new food item to the menu.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response>
    AdminController.addVendor(VendorDto vendorDto)
    This method handles the HTTP POST request to add a new vendor.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response>
    UserController.addWallett(String token, WalletRequest walletRequest)
    Handles a request to add a new wallet for the user identified by the provided authentication token.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response>
    UserController.cancelOrder(String token, int orderId)
    Cancels an existing food order for the authenticated user.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response>
    UserController.order(String token, List<FoodQuantityDto> foodQuantityDtos)
    This method handles requests for placing food orders.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response>
    UserController.payment(String token, PaymentRequest paymentRequest)
    Handles a request to process a payment for a food order using the wallet identified by the provided payment request.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response>
    RegistrationController.register(@Valid RegistrationRequest request)
    This method handles the HTTP POST request to register a new user.
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Response>
    AdminController.updateRole(String userId, @Valid @Pattern(regexp="[A-Z_]",message="Should contain only upper case letters and _") String role)
    This method handles the HTTP PUT request to update the role of a user.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Response
    FoodItemQuantityServiceImpl.addFoodItems(FoodItemDto itemDto, String token)
    This method adds a new Food Item Quantity for a given vendor to the repository.
    Response
    VendorServiceImpl.addVendor(VendorDto vendorDto)
    This method takes input as VendorDto and creates a new Vendor object and saves it to the database.
    Response
    WalletServiceImpl.addWallet(String token, WalletRequest walletRequest)
     
    Response
    FoodOrderServiceImpl.cancelOrder(String token, int orderId)
    Cancels an existing food order for the authenticated user.
    Response
    FoodOrderServiceImpl.order(String token, List<FoodQuantityDto> foodQuantityDtos)
    This method takes in the JWT token and a list of FoodQuantityDto objects and places an order for the specified food items.
    Response
    PaymentServiceImpl.payment(String token, PaymentRequest paymentRequest)
    Processes a payment for an existing food order for the authenticated user, using funds from the specified wallet.
    Response
    UserServiceImpl.register(RegistrationRequest request)
    The method takes in a userID and a password as input and registers the user with the given userID and password
    Response
    UserServiceImpl.updateRole(String userID, String role)
    The method takes in a userID and a role as input and updates the role of the user with the given userID
